Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 14
Notes: American relief has injected new life into China’s forestry. More than 6 million trees have been planted and land for more than 32 million mu trees has been prepared. The picture shows a group of destitute men who have been organized in a work team preparing soil for growing pine trees.Nr. 14 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
